titles.title: Education Professional Development Tax Credit Act of 2007
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow elementary and secondary school teachers a credit against income tax for professional development and training expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
11/5/2007--Introduced.
Education Professional Development Tax Credit Act of 2007 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow full-time elementary and secondary school teachers a tax credit for professional development and training expenses.
